long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search7 streamlines your web search flow. In the search panel you can see results from your previous search action, switch to them directly without going back to the search engine, and edit your search query while staying on the same page.

When you lookup something on Google, our extension fetches the results and displays them in the side panel. This side panel stays visible when you click on a search result. Instead of navigating back to the search results page, you can go to other search results directly by clicking on them in the side panel.
